title: Seth Rogen
description:
Kevin Hart is joined by writer, director, actor, and comedy icon Seth Rogen on this week’s episode. The two discuss everything from his work with Judd Apatow, to the controversy surrounding his movie ‘The Interview’, and the lessons he learned from Lorne Michaels about how to make a great film.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Seth Rogen, Kevin Hart)
